Title: Sorting Animation
Description: .NET Component to show Sorting Animation of 3 sorting algorithm such as Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, and Selection Sort
HomeWiki:
This component is our first .NET desktop component. It was created as the final project of Component Oriented Programming in Informatics Faculty of Duta Wacana Christian University . This component is to show the animation of some sorting algorithm such as Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, and Selection Sort.

Please mention us if you want to use this component

Author:
